prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Organ, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Brass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Organ, and Piano, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Organ, and Piano, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Brass, Drums, Guitar, Synth Pad, Organ, Piano, Bass absent.
